alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Statement issued March 05 at 9:45PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH 1 AM TONIGHT... WHAT...Minor flooding resulting from heavy showers for the last hour. WHERE...all of American Samoa WHEN...Through 1 am tonight IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall and runoff may cause elevated stream and drainage ditch levels. Ponding may occur on roads and low lying areas. Please take extra caution due to hazardous driving conditions. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect gusty winds during heavy downpours. FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 945 PO ASO SA MATI 5 2023 ...UA IAI LE FAUTUAGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE 1 i le po nei... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega e mafua mai i timuga mamafa i le itula ua mavae atu. NOFOAGA...mo Amerika Samoa atoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le 1 i le po nei AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa ma tafega e faatupulaia ai le siisii vave o auvai. E ono tutupu ai lologa i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga aafia gofie. Faamolemole faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...E agi fa`ata`uta`u savili i taimi e mamafa ai timuga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Faamolemole, ia faaeteete i taimi e femalagaa`i ai i luga o auala. Aua ne`i savalia pe uia auvai ma aualatele o loo malosi ai tafega. E ono faatupula`ia sologa mai i mauga ona o le susu o le eleelee ua iai nei. Fa`amolemole, ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: The public is advised to take necessary precautions when driving due to hazardous driving road conditions and flooded roadways. Do not cross fast flowing water in streams and on roads. Mud and landslides are also possible along steep and mountainous areas as grounds become saturated.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
